##  **`r params$player`** 
`r params$player` awesome inning of double hundred
```{r}
#| echo: false

df<-fetch_player_data(player_id, "Test") %>%
  mutate(NotOut = (Dismissal == "not out")) #|> filter(Date>"2018-07-01")

AAave <- df %>%
  filter(!is.na(Runs)) %>%
  summarise(Average = sum(Runs) / (n() - sum(NotOut))) %>%
  pull(Average)

AAave <- df %>%
  filter(!is.na(Runs)) %>%
  summarise(Average = sum(Runs) / (n() - sum(NotOut))) %>%
pull(Average)


names(AAave) <- paste("Average =", round(AAave, 2))

title_text<-paste0('  ')
# Plot Test scores
ggplot(df) +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept = AAave), col="blue", size=1) +
  geom_point(aes(x = Date, y = Runs, col = NotOut, size=0.001))  +
  scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_axis(~., breaks = AAave))+theme(legend.position = "none") +labs(title=title_text)+theme_minimal()
```
